DOC.brief_summary: The aim feasibility study test recruitment participant Phase 1 study re-recruitment retention participant Phase 2 study . The investigator also assess acceptability recruitment strategy data collection participant . The effect pre-pregnancy factor ( biophysical , genetic , socioeconomic , behavioural psychological ) obstetric , cardiovascular , socioeconomic , behavioural psychological outcome examine .
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study recruit 300 woman . The investigator anticipate subset recruit become pregnant pilot study . This feasibility study two phase : - Phase 1 : A detailed characterisation nulliparous woman address Oxfordshire work Oxfordshire - Phase 2 : Detailed assessment event immediately first viable pregnancy . During Phase 1 visit : - Participation explain research nurse/midwife , question answer woman , agree , sign consent form . - A questionnaire cover medical family history , socioeconomic information , behavioural factor psychological measure complete . - Baseline anthropometry - height , weight , hip/ waist ratio , USS measurement fat ( thigh abdomen ) , bioimpedence . - Cardiovascular - pulse BP ( peripheral / central ) , arterial stiffness , echocardiogram , carotid image endothelial function ( endo-check ) test complete . - Fasting venous blood sample ( maximum 40 ml ) include whole blood maternal DNA . - Urine sample - Salivette Once participant become pregnant eligible enter phase 2 study . Phase 2 involve 6 visit 7 , 11-13 , 18-20 , 28 , 34 week gestation 3 month post-delivery . During visit repeat measurement investigation carry . In addition , fetal ultrasound 7 28 week questionnaires 7 , 28 3 month post-delivery . An acceptability questionnaire also give participant follow completion study . The end feasibility study date final phase 2 visit last participant become pregnant feasibility study . By collect data investigator anticipate record report longitudinal data relation following : •Incidence obstetric complication The incidence pre-eclampsia , gestational diabetes , pregnancy induce hypertension , antenatal postnatal depression preterm birth . •Longitudinal variation cardiovascular parameter Changes longitudinal measure blood pressure , carotid intima medium thickness , pulse wave velocity , cardiac structure function endothelial function pre-conception 34 week gestation . •Longitudinal change socioeconomic factor By use questionnaire pre-conception , 7 week gestation 28 week gestation record employment relationship status . •Longitudinal change behavioural factor By use questionnaire pre-conception , 7 week gestation 28 week gestation investigator record diet , weight control perception , exercise , smoking , alcohol use drug use . •Longitudinal change psychological factor By use questionnaire pre-conception , 7 week gestation 28 week gestation investigator record level anxiety , depression quality life perceive health status . •Longitudinal change health status participant family By use questionnaire pre-conception investigator record participant ' medical family history , reproductive sexual history pain perception . At 7 week gestation 28 week gestation questionnaire enquire change addition participant ' medical family history well reproductive sexual health pain perception .
DOC.criteria: Participant willing able give inform consent participation study Participant female , age 1840 year Participant pregnant Participant live work Oxfordshire A previous live birth still birth 24 week gestation
